DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate potential drug-drug interaction Dimebon ketoconazole omeprazole , potent inhibitor drug metabolize enzyme CYP3A4 CYP2C19 , respectively .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase I Study To Estimate The Effect Of Ketoconazole And Omeprazole On The Pharmacokinetics Of Dimebon In Healthy Subjects Who Are Normal Or Poor CYP2D6 Metabolizers
DOC.criteria: Subjects willing able comply schedule visit , treatment plan , laboratory test , study procedure . Subjects must either CYP2D6 EM ( n=12 ) PM ( n=12 ) status base genotyping screen . Subjects must CYP2C19 EM status base status screen . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease . Subjects history previous seizure convulsion significant head trauma . Subjects specifically allergic imidazole antifungal agent . Subjects specifically allergic omeprazole proton pump inhibitor . Any condition possibly affect drug absorption ( eg , gastrectomy ) . Subjects hypersensitivity reaction Dimebon antihistamine . Consumption grapefruit grapefruit containing product within 7 day prior first dose study medication . Subjects currently take omeprazole , proton pump inhibitor , antacid , H2blockers CYP2C19 inhibitor . Pregnant nursing female ; female childbearing potential unwilling unable use acceptable method nonhormonal contraception outline protocol least 14 day prior first dose study medication .
